sys_ui_message.message:
After working from home for some time, we have all settled into our own routines. While working from home comes with its own advantages, working away from the safety of our buildings comes with its challenges.
You can read the following articles on how to create a safe working environment both online and physically: 1. [Ensuring your safety while working from home](https://absahr.service-now.com/ways_of_work?id=kb_article_view&sysparm_article=KB0012657) 2. [Secure remote working](https://absahr.service-now.com/ways_of_work?id=kb_article_view&sysparm_article=KB0012615)
